questions.question: This term refers to the creative short-circuiting of electronic devices to create new sounds.
This type of electronic device is commonly used in circuit bending for its simple circuits and sound generation capabilities.
This tool is essential for making precise connections and modifications in circuit bending.
This component is often added to circuit-bent devices to control the pitch of the sound.
This term refers to the practice of experimenting with electronic circuits to discover new and unexpected sounds.
